duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and improve heavy equipment attachments.
Conduct Finite Element Analysis (FEA) and other simulations to validate designs.
Analyze patents and technical literature to ensure compliance and identify opportunities for innovation.
Travel to remote locations to take measurements of attachments for design and improvement purposes.
Perform reverse engineering activities to convert physical attachments into accurate mechanical engineering drawings.
Liaise with cross-functional teams to deliver products that meet high standards and customer requirements.
Provide technical expertise and support for troubleshooting and problem-solving activities.
Prepare and deliver technical presentations to internal and external stakeholders.
Occasionally report to the Irvine office for team meetings, project updates, and collaborative work.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field
